comments.author: Jennifer
comments.body: I'll join you ruffians as soon as you cart a cooler around with martinis and tom collinses for mid-ride "rest stops." Or when I've learned to live with that soreness between my shoulderblades, whichever comes first. See you soon!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Yeah, and right behind J's "refreshment cart" you can hitch my crash cart. Double-stock the ace bandage and phenyl-oprabetadine... I go through that stuff like crazy. Speaking of street rumors, we hear that Rupert Murdoch has shown interest in the Frenzy. He considers it a "fair and balanced" news source, but would like to make a few tweaks. He also mentioned cutting staff. Not to be alarmist, SB, but you _do_ have a backup plan, don't you?
